snippet: In separate incidents, the decapitated bodies of a 7-year-old girl and a 12-year-old boy were found on Friday, continuing a spate of grisly beheadings in Afghanistan this week.
abstract: Decapitated bodies of a 7-year-old girl and a 12-year-old boy are found in Afghanistan's Kandahar Province and Kapisa Province, continuing a spate of grisly beheadings in the country; residents blame the Taliban.

byline.original: By GRAHAM BOWLEY and TAIMOOR SHAH
byline.contributor: Graham Bowley reported from Kabul, and Taimoor Shah from Kandahar, Afghanistan. Jawad Sukhanyar contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: In separate incidents, the decapitated bodies of a 7-year-old girl and a 12-year-old boy were found on Friday, continuing a spate of grisly beheadings in Afghanistan this week.

headline.seo: Young Girl and Boy Found Beheaded in Afghanistan
headline.main: Young Girl and Boy Found Beheaded in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: Decapitated Bodies of a Girl, 7, and a Boy, 12, Are Discovered in Afghanistan
